product_name: Pearl Izumi ELITE Gel FF Bike Gloves - Women's
long_description: Pearl Izumi Elite Gel women's bike gloves put padding in all the right places for those long rides. Glove fit minimizes palm bunching which allows for better grip comfort and handlebar feel. Strategically and anatomically positioned gel padding absorbs shock, protecting ulnar and median nerves. Polyester stretch fabric on back of hands wicks moisture and enhances ventilation; soft fabric on the thumb gives you a gentle place to wipe your nose. Icefil(R) polyester fibers work to cool your skin when things start warming up. Rip-and-stick pull tabs on wrists close gloves snugly and ease removal; easy-off glove removal tab on fingers. Soft, durable synthetic leather palms maximize comfort and grip.
short_description: Pearl Izumi Elite Gel women's bike gloves put padding in all the right places for those long rides.
